Author: newvulcan#4719
Content: I know I have to be patient, but I've only notarized 6 BEER and nothing else in the past 10 hours or so. Everything appears to be working - I have a log file for iguana running. The only thing I've noticed is a recurrent message "error signing raw PIZZA utxoduplicates tx don't have PIZZA utxo, please send funds" which is odd 'cause I've lots of utxo for each of the coins. Autosplitting seems to be working, and my utxo balance is getting really large as its not being used.

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: @And1_89 that is how you create utxos, yes

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: You can use `./komodo-cli sendtoaddress $address $(komodo-cli getbalance) "" "" true`

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: to merge them into a single utxo

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: and then use the split script to split however many you want
